text: Dogtooth (; Kynodontas) is a 2009 Greek psychological drama movie directed by Yorgos Lanthimos and starring Christos Stergioglou, Michelle Valley, Angeliki Papoulia, Christos Passalis, Mary Tsoni, Alexander Voulgaris. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2011. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2009 drama movies Category:2009 LGBT movies Category:2000s psychological movies Category:Greek movies Category:Independent movies Category:Movies directed by Yorgos Lanthimos Category:Movies set in Athens Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about child abuse
title: Dogtooth (movie)
